item.title: DRH
item.description: score:-34 Chances: The initiation of coverage by Wolfe Research on hotel REITs indicates a potential opportunity for investors to compare and contrast similar stocks to identify potential outperformers. The declaration of a cash dividend of $0.03 per common share by DiamondRock Hospitality Company reflects a steady return for shareholders and could attract income-focused investors.
